quotes.name: Thanos
quotes.quote: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.

quotes.name: Joker
quotes.quote: In their last moments, people show you who they really are.

quotes.name: Henri Ducard
quotes.quote: You must become more than just a man in the mind of your opponent.

quotes.name: Erik Lehnsherr
quotes.quote: Peace was never an option.

quotes.name: Bane
quotes.quote: No one cared who I was until I put on the mask.

quotes.name: Erik Stevens
quotes.quote: Bury me in the ocean with my ancestors who jumped from ships, because they knew death was better than bondage.

quotes.name: Maul
quotes.quote: Unfortunately for you, history will not see it that way.

quotes.name: Norman Osborn
quotes.quote: Despite everything you've done for them, eventually they will hate you.

quotes.name: Quentin Beck
quotes.quote: People need to believe, and nowadays, they'll believe anything.

quotes.name: Kaecilius
quotes.quote: People think in terms of good and evil when really, time is the true enemy of us all.

quotes.name: Ultron
quotes.quote: Everyone creates the thing they dread.

quotes.name: Wenwu
quotes.quote: I have eaten more salt than you have had rice in your life.

quotes.name: Red Skull
quotes.quote: You pretend to be a simple soldier, but in reality, you are just afraid to admit that we have left humanity behind.

quotes.name: The Riddler
quotes.quote: If you are justice, please do not lie / What is the price for your blind eye?

quotes.name: Lockdown
quotes.quote: The trouble with loyalty to a cause is that the cause will always betray you.

quotes.name: Harvey Dent
quotes.quote: You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.

quotes.name: Ben Solo
quotes.quote: Let the past die. Kill it, if you have to.

quotes.name: Helmut Zemo
quotes.quote: The desire to become a superhuman cannot be separated from supremacist ideals.

quotes.name: Lex Luthor
quotes.quote: If God is all-powerful, he cannot be all good. And if he is all good, then he cannot be all-powerful.

quotes.name: Negan Smith
quotes.quote: If you don't protect what belongs to you, then sooner or later it belongs to someone else.

quotes.name: Wilson Fisk
quotes.quote: A woman that can be bought isn't worth having.

quotes.name: Petyr Baelish
quotes.quote: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused.

quotes.name: Hannibal Lecter
quotes.quote: Cruelty is a gift humanity has given itself.

quotes.name: Gustavo Fring
quotes.quote: A dog who bites every owner he's had can only be disciplined with a firm hand or put down.

quotes.name: Arthur Fleck
quotes.quote: The worse part of having a mental illness is people expect you to behave as if you don't.

quotes.name: Tyler Durden
quotes.quote: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.

quotes.name: Frank Castle
quotes.quote: You know you're one bad day away from being me.

quotes.name: White Death
quotes.quote: If you do not control your fate, it will control you.

quotes.name: Syndrome
quotes.quote: When everyone's super, no one will be.

quotes.name: Ernesto de la Cruz
quotes.quote: You have to be willing to do whatever it takes to seize your moment.

quotes.name: Ivan Vanko
quotes.quote: If you can make God bleed, people will cease to believe in him.

quotes.name: Flint Marko
quotes.quote: I'm not a bad person. Just had bad luck.

quotes.name: Voldemort
quotes.quote: There is no good and evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it.

quotes.name: Otto Octavius
quotes.quote: Intelligence is not a privilege, it's a gift. And you use it for the good of mankind.

quotes.name: Adrian Toomes
quotes.quote: We build the roads and we fight all their wars and everything. They don't care about us.

quotes.name: Kenny Ackerman
quotes.quote: Everyone had to be drunk on something to keep pushing on. Everyone was a slave to something.

quotes.name: Eren Yeager
quotes.quote: You win, you live. You lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win.
